name: How a Catastrophic Necromancer Retires
author: Soju Gwisin
content: At the age of twenty, Ji-hyuk had been summoned to Seron by a magician named Theros, where he was forced to live as a necromancer. After countless years of battling and hardship, he finally defeated the Demon King and returned to Earth. But the Earth he came back to wasnâ€™t the one he remembered. The world had been ravaged by Gates and monsters, and to make matters worse, all the gold and treasures he brought back had vanished into thin air. Now stuck as an F-Rank Awakened, Ji-hyuk had no choice
